channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Verify Access Container
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Verify Access Container

item.title: CVE-2024-28787|2024-06-04T18:03:06.883Z -- ibm -- security%20verify%20access%20container
item.description: IBM Security Verify Access 10.0.0 through 10.0.7 and IBM Application Gateway 20.01 through 24.03 could allow a remote attacker to obtain highly sensitive private information or cause a denial of service using a specially crafted HTTP request. IBM X-Force ID: 286584.
